page.title: 10POAM
page.content:
God made many lovely things, Flowers,sunsets and trees. And after all these he made something more true, Parents, children,me and you.
Life is not such a bad thing 'cos when we're older we'll be buying gold and diamond rings. Women are sweet,just like honey, If you choose the wrong one you'll end up with no money. Then you'll have to find another, And with any luck she'll be a mother.
Some times life is very bad, And nine times out of ten it ends up sad. When people die other people cry,but life isn't that bad even though people are sad.
